skins.selfIntroduction: I am Z21, Iron Blood Navy Z-class 1936-Type destroyer. I was the flagship during Operation Weser¨¹bung, but was sunk by HMS Courageous. I won't lose next time!
skins.acquisition: I am Z21, Narvik Z-class destroyer flagship, Wilheim Heidkamp! Since you worked so hard to find me, I suppose I'll have to follow you home.
skins.login: Commander, you're back! Eh...? It's... it's not like I actually care!
skins.details: Is there something on my face? Stop staring at me!
skins.secretaryIdle1: You should be more careful if you want me to be your flagship... Don't misunderstand, I'm not actually worried about you.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm staying beside you, but only because its my duty as secretary ship!
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you're really tired, I suppose you could rest on my lap for a while...
skins.secretaryTouch: Didn't we agree that you'd give me a heads up before poking me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ah! What... what are you doing? One more time and I'll really get mad!
